title: General greeting
content: Hi, my name is Sakinah! Welcome to AJobThing!

title: First Touch Point
content: Hi, my name is Sakinah! I am your support representative from AJobThing!

title: Replacement Job Ad
content: We're sorry that your published job ad is not performing as expected. I have assigned a free job ad to your account as compensation.

title: Job Ad Expiry
content: Hi employer! Just a friendly reminder that you still have 2 remaining job ads. Do you any help?

title: Thank You
content: Hi, thank you for choosing us!
